name: Bun Bun's Night House
description: This bun bun he is a killer anatronic that wants to kill you. you need to shine your flash light to get him and to make him leave. he also has some other friend like lusabear, frazzle nut and fo fo. also there is the scrach version that works better but trash but if you do want to play that here: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/728393437
